rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106667

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire HAQ-DI Test Code Terminology

definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index test code.
name: QS-Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire HAQ-DI Test Code Terminology
synonyms: QS-Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index Test Code

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Dressing & Grooming: Are you able to dress yourself, including tying shoelaces and doing buttons?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Dress Yourself

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Dressing & Grooming: Are you able to shampoo your hair?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Shampoo Hair

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Arising: Are you able to stand up from a straight chair?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Stand Up From Chair
synonyms: HAQ01-Stand Up From a Straight Chair

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Arising: Are you able to get in and out of bed?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Get In and Out of Bed
synonyms: HAQ01-Get In and Out of Bed

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Eating: Are you able to cut your meat?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Cut Meat

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Eating: Are you able to lift a full cup or glass to your mouth?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Lift Cup or Glass to Mouth
synonyms: HAQ01-Lift a Full Cup or Glass to Mouth

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Eating: Are you able to open a new milk carton?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Open Milk Carton

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Walking: Are you able to walk outdoors on flat ground?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Walk Outdoors On Flat Ground

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Walking: Are you able to climb up five steps?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Climb Up Steps

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Cane.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Cane

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Walker.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Walker

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Crutches.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Crutches

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Wheelchair.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Wheelchair

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Devices used for Dressing (button hook, zipper pull, long-handled shoe horn, etc.).
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Used For Dressing

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Built up or special utensils.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Built Up or Special Utensils
synonyms: HAQ01-Aid: Built Up or Special Utensils

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Special or built up chair.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Special or Built Up Chair
synonyms: HAQ01-Aid: Special or Built Up Chair

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Other.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices For Dress/Arising/Eat/Walk-Other

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Other (Specify).
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices For Dress/Arising/Eat/Walk-Specify

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Dressing and Grooming.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Dressing and Grooming

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Arising.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Arising

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Eating.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Eating

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Walking.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Walking

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Hygiene: Are you able to wash and dry your body?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Wash and Dry Body

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Hygiene: Are you able to take a tub bath?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Take Tub Bath

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Hygiene: Are you able to get on and off the toilet?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Get On and Off Toilet
synonyms: HAQ01-Get On and Off The Toilet

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Reach: Are you able to reach and get down a 5 pound object (such as a bag of sugar) from just above your head?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Reach and Get Down Object From Above Head
synonyms: HAQ01-Reach-Get Down 5 Lb Obj Above Head

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Reach: Are you able to bend down to pick up clothing from the floor?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Bend Down and Pick Up Clothing From Floor
synonyms: HAQ01-Bend Down Pick Up Clothing - Floor

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Grip: Are you able to open car doors?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Open Car Doors

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Grip: Are you able to open jars which have been previously opened?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Open Previously Opened Jars

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Grip: Are you able to turn faucets on and off?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Turn Faucets On and Off

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Activities: Are you able to run errands and shop?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Run Errands and Shop

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Activities: Are you able to get in and out of a car?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Get In and Out of Car
synonyms: HAQ01-Get In and Out of a Car

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Activities: Are you able to do chores such as vacuuming or yardwork?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Able to Do Chores - Vacuuming or Yardwork

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Raised toilet seat.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Raised Toilet Seat

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Bathtub seat.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Bathtub Seat

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Jar opener (for jars previously opened).
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Jar Opener (Jars Previously Opened)

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Bathtub bar.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Bathtub Bar

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Long-handled appliances for reach.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Long-Handled Appliances for Reach

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Long-handled appliances in bathroom.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices - Long-Handled Appliances in Bathroom

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Other.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices For Hygiene/Reach/Grip/Act-Other

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Aids or devices that you usually use for any of these activities: Other (Specify).
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Aids or Devices For Hygiene/Reach/Grip/Act-Specify

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Hygiene.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Hygiene

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Reach.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Reach

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Gripping and opening things.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Gripping and Opening Things

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - Usually need help from another person: Errands and chores.
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Help From Another Person - Errands and Chores

terms.definition: Health Assessment Questionnaire Disability Index - How much pain have you had because of your illness in the past week?
terms.preferredTerm: HAQ-DI - Severity of Pain in the Past Week
